alert.note: Alert for Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 22 at 12:27PM CDT until March 22 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL HINDS COUNTY... At 1226 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Flora to Raymond, moving northeast at 60 mph. A Tornado Warning also remains in effect for portions of Yazoo, Madison, and Hinds counties. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Jackson around 1230 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
